Docs.param: The maximum permitted length of the result string
The point at which to start clipping

MemberSignature.Value: public static int FindMismatchPosition (string expected, string actual, int istart, bool ignoreCase);
.method public static hidebysig int32 FindMismatchPosition(string expected, string actual, int32 istart, bool ignoreCase) cil managed

Docs.param: The index in the strings at which comparison should start
Boolean indicating whether case should be ignored
Docs.summary: Shows the position two strings start to differ. Comparison starts at the start index.
Docs.returns: -1 if no mismatch found, or the index where mismatch found

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string GetTypeRepresentation(object obj) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the representation of a type as used in NUnitLite. This is the same as Type.ToString() except for arrays, which are displayed with their declared sizes.
